definition: bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Niao3 lei4 Xue2 hui4

sentences.english: Among 54 local breed species, 37 species distribute in Oriental.
sentences.chinese: 在54種當地繁殖鳥類中，東洋界37種。

sentences.english: The great auk is an extinct bird.
sentences.chinese: 大海雀是種滅絕的鳥類。

sentences.english: Transnationalism designates a recent shift in migration bird patterns.
sentences.chinese: 跨國主義者指出了一個最近發生遷徙鳥類上的轉變。

sentences.english: Zhalong is the ideal home for cranes and many other endangered birds.
sentences.chinese: 扎龍是鶴和其它瀕危鳥類的理想棲息地。

sentences.english: Birds that overwinter in your garden need to find food 365 days of the year.
sentences.chinese: 在你的院子中過冬的鳥類一年365天都需要覓食。

sentences.english: The general rules of avian community succession.
sentences.chinese: 崇明東灘溼地鳥類羣落的演替規律。

sentences.english: These voracious scavengers work together to strip the carcasses of large animals.
sentences.chinese: 這些貪婪的食腐鳥類共同協作，分食大型動物的屍體。

sentences.english: He was editor of The Auk.
sentences.chinese: 他曾是著名鳥類學期刊《海雀》的編輯。

sentences.english: But birds have an extra cone for seeing violet and ultraviolet light.
sentences.chinese: 但是鳥類多了一種錐體，能識別紫色光和紫外線。

sentences.english: Insect-eating songbirds switch to fruits rich in antioxidants before migrating.
sentences.chinese: 食蟲鳥類在遷移之前喫富含抗氧化劑的漿果。

sentences.english: This provide a important data for the study of birds band.
sentences.chinese: 爲我國鳥類環志遷徙研究提供了重要數據。

sentences.english: Researchers report in Current Biology that they can affect birds’ patterns of movement on large scales.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員報告說它們可以影響到鳥類的大型活動方式。

sentences.english: Both are designated primarily for migrating and wintering birds.
sentences.chinese: 它們都主要是過路和越冬鳥類的棲息地。

sentences.english: This is bad news for birds like the Whitethroat, a common farmland bird.
sentences.chinese: 對於田野上常見的白喉雀這種鳥類，這是個壞消息。

sentences.english: I'm going birdwatching at the market.
sentences.chinese: 我打算去市場觀察鳥類。

sentences.english: Chat, carry birds existence to multiply greatly development progress of history heavy responsibility also.
sentences.chinese: 聊天乎，擔負鳥類生存繁衍發展進步之歷史重任者也。

definition: (of a bird) to perch/(of creatures in general) to inhabit/to dwell
specimen/sample/the root cause and symptoms of a disease
to rear (an animal) in an enclosure
